valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: New lows expected Bailey 987, Fastnet 991 and Shannon 991 by midnight tonight. Lows Fair Isle 983 and Sole 998 both losing their identities
